description: Law in Action Legal Policymaking Externship offers students the opportunity to gain unique insights into Government policy making by working directly on various projects at the Ministry of Law. The module provides a structured programme for students who wish to understand and acquire skills relevant to policy development in a Government setting. Students will be involved in a wide spectrum of policy and legislative projects, such as civil and criminal procedure, arbitration law, intellectual property and legal industry development. Students will be part of a dynamic and challenging process of shaping policy goals to enhance the legal infrastructure in Singapore.
title: Law in Action Legal Policymaking Externship
